LoginPage.title: Welcome to OM Suivi
LoginPage.description: Log in or create an account to start tracking your work time.
LoginPage.nameMinLengthError: Name must contain at least 2 characters.
LoginPage.passwordMinLengthError: Password must contain at least 6 characters.
LoginPage.registerErrorInUse: This email address is already in use.
LoginPage.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
LoginPage.resetSuccessDescription: Check your inbox to reset your password.
LoginPage.resetErrorDescription: Could not send reset email. Please check the address.

TimeTrackingPage.title: Time Tracking
TimeTrackingPage.statusInProgress: Your work session is in progress.
TimeTrackingPage.statusIdle: Select your shift and start tracking.
TimeTrackingPage.selectShiftPlaceholder: Select your shift for the day
TimeTrackingPage.recentEntriesDescription: A log of your recent work sessions.
TimeTrackingPage.shiftNotSelectedDescription: Please select your shift before starting the timer.
TimeTrackingPage.geoNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support geolocation.
TimeTrackingPage.geoFailedDescription: Could not get your position. Please check permissions.
TimeTrackingPage.locationConfirmDescriptionPart1: AI suggests your current location is
TimeTrackingPage.locationConfirmDescriptionPart2: . Do you want to associate this location with your time entry?

missionMode.title: Mission Mode Activated
missionMode.body: You have left the work zone. Your time tracking continues.

disconnection.title: Session Recovery
disconnection.description: Your device was disconnected. Did you finish your shift around {time}?

pauseLimitExceededNotification.title: OM Suivi: Pause limit exceeded
pauseLimitExceededNotification.body: Please resume your shift manually in the app.

ManualEntryDialog.title: Add Manual Entry
ManualEntryDialog.description: Enter your start and end times for a past work session.
ManualEntryDialog.endTimeErrorAlert: End time must be after start time.

ProfilePage.title: Settings
ProfilePage.personalInfoDescription: Manage your personal and contractual information.
ProfilePage.nameMinLengthError: Name must contain at least 2 characters.
ProfilePage.salaryDescription: Your hourly rate is calculated automatically (Salary / 173.33) and rounded.
ProfilePage.remindersDescription: Set up alerts to avoid forgetting to clock in/out.
ProfilePage.enableRemindersDescription: Receive a notification to record your hours.

reminders.notificationBody: Don't forget to clock in or out for your shift!

ProfilePage.settingsUpdatedDescription: Your information has been saved successfully.
ProfilePage.workplaceSettingsDescription: Define your primary work zone for automatic clock-in.
ProfilePage.setWorkplaceButton: Set my current location as workplace
ProfilePage.radiusDescription: The distance around your workplace for automatic clock-in.
ProfilePage.radiusMinError: Radius must be at least 10 meters.

ReportsPage.title: Dashboard
ReportsPage.description: A summary of your earnings and work hours.
ReportsPage.financialSummaryDescription: An overview of your regular hours, overtime, and estimated earnings for the current month.
ReportsPage.weeklyBreakdownDescription: Regular vs. overtime hours logged each day of the current week.
ReportsPage.calculationDetailsDescription: An explanation of how your estimated payout is calculated.

ExportReportPage.title: Export Report
ExportReportPage.locationDisclaimer: Geolocation data was automatically recorded where available.
ExportReportPage.tamperProof: This document is auto-generated and digitally sealed. Any alteration invalidates it.

TeamPage.title: Team Overview
TeamPage.description: A summary of hours worked by your colleagues this week.
TeamPage.weeklySummaryDescription: Data sharing and summarization for colleagues.
TeamPage.noTeamTitle: You are not yet on a team
TeamPage.noTeamDescription: Contact your administrator to be added to a team to see your colleagues' data.

AdminPage.title: Administration
AdminPage.usersDescription: A list of all users registered in the system.
AdminPage.noUsers: No users found in the system.
AdminPage.configDescription: Adjust global settings for the entire application.
AdminPage.rulesDescription: Manage global rules for shifts and breaks.
AdminPage.autoClockInDescription: Globally enable or disable automatic shift start via geofence.
AdminPage.breakDurationDescription: This feature is not yet fully implemented.
AdminPage.configUpdatedDescription: Global settings have been saved successfully.
AdminPage.deleteEntryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this time entry for {date}? This action cannot be undone.
AdminPage.deleteSuccessDescription: The time entry has been successfully deleted.
AdminPage.overtimeRulesDescription: Set the increase percentages for each overtime tier. Enter a value like 1.2 for a 120% rate.
AdminPage.rateMustBePositive: Rate must be a positive number greater than or equal to 1.

Shared.pleaseCompleteProfile: Please complete your profile before viewing reports.
Shared.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have the required permissions to view this page.
Shared.pleaseSetProfessionDescription: To start tracking time, you must first select a valid profession in your profile.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
